alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 7:41AM CST until March 05 at 5:02PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Poteau affecting Le Flore County. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, extensive flooding of crop and pasturelands occur between Shady Point and Arkoma. Many roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 37.8 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
